events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department for the role of software developer contributing to backend services.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage your application and will contact you shortly to proceed with the next steps.
We conducted your initial screening interview to understand your background and technical expertise relevant to our software engineering needs.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening feedback and confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior software engineers for next week to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview with excellent performance on algorithms and system design questions.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your motivations, culture fit, and to review the compensation package details.
You completed the HR interview, providing insightful answers about your career goals and alignment with our company values.
We are pleased to propose you a formal offer to join our engineering team, including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are excited about the possibility of you joining our team.
We acknowledge your acceptance of the job offer and welcome you aboard as a new software engineer in our company.
Your onboarding process has begun. Our team is preparing all necessary resources and schedules to integrate you smoothly.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully with your onboarding completed. Welcome to our engineering family!
